title: Interview: Superchunk's Mac McCaughan on 'Wild Loneliness,' and pre-internet touring
description:
Following the release of their 2022 album 'Wild Loneliness,' Mac McCaughan of North Carolinian icons Superchunk joined Mary Lucia to talk about the band's early experiences playing in Minnesota, touring in pre-internet times, and his decision to lean into a more acoustic sound on this release.

Don't miss the band's full virtual session, including performances of tracks from 'Wild Loneliness' here: https://youtu.be/jQOG6dhv8qs

title: Superchunk - This Night (live performance for The Current)
description:
Following the release of their 2022 album 'Wild Loneliness,' North Carolina's Superchunk join The Current to play "This Night" from their new record. 

Plus, check out the bands full virtual session, including an interview with Superchunk's Mac McCaughan: https://youtu.be/jQOG6dhv8qs
